products.title: Daytona, Vivid White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: White doesn't get much whiter or brighter than the daytona in vivid white. This icy white hue covers the durable faux wood of the shutter flawlessly, and works wonderfully as any of their different style options: tier on tier, caf, or full height. Pair the vivid white with any colour scheme you like, but for a truly striking style, stick to an all-white theme in an open-plan kitchen. Think white walls, white units, white floor, white everything - the look will be bold and vivacious, and certainly hard to forget.

products.title: Daytona, Horizon Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Soft and subtle, the daytona in horizon grey is a pretty shade of grey that works as an attractive neutral for stronger tones. The durable, high quality faux wood the shutter is made from is energy efficient, water-resistant, and not prone to warping or cracking. Choose from three distinct shutter types. Match the horizon grey to a rich red feature wall for a look that really stands out. This cosy colour scheme is perfect for a living room.

products.title: Daytona, Antique White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Daytona's antique white offers a beautiful classic white with a vintage overtone. The faux wood is durable and resistant to cracking and warping from moisture, wear, and tear. It's also an energy efficient solution for your home. Choose from three different styles. Use the antique white as part of a shabby chic or vintage dcor scheme, surrounding it with dusky shades of pink or blue for a pretty yet elegant look in a bedroom or living room.

products.title: Daytona, Dignity Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: An attractive mid-grey, the dignity grey, from the daytona range, can be the star of the show or the colour-popping neutral. Choose from versatile tier on tier, traditional full height, or boutique caf styles. Team the dignity grey with a dark grass green for an unusual and quirky colour scheme that brings the outside in. Try this for a striking look in the dining room or den. Include the occasional pale grey to lighten the look and add some extra depth to the theme.

products.title: Daytona, Cool White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Available in three distinct yet equally lovely styles, the daytona cool white is neutral, calming, and stylish. Go for the caf for a boutique look, full height for a classic shutter, or tier on tier for something with a difference and plenty of flexibility. Set the cool white against equally cool pastel shades, such as mint green or baby blue. Accessorise throughout with matching pastel hues, as well as plenty of white.

products.title: Daytona, Soho - Plantation Shutter
products.description: In attractive grey-toned cream, the daytona soho is the perfect neutral. It will work with a number of colour schemes and is available in three distinct styles of shutter. The water-resistant faux wood is guaranteed not to crack or warp, making it ideal for bathrooms and kitchens. Settle the soho into a bedroom, living room, or master bedroom full of coordinating shades of grey, including charcoal greys, dove greys, and oatmeal greys.

products.title: Daytona, Linen - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The pretty cream tone of the daytona in linen is soft and cosy, and covers the shutters flawlessly. Durable, water-resistant faux wood means no cracking and no warping, making them perfect for any room in the home, even bathrooms and kitchens. Settle the linen amidst warm chocolate browns and subtle lattes for a relaxing and luxurious look in the master bedroom or living room. Keep the room feeling light and airy with plenty of matching creams and lots of light.

products.title: Daytona, Shark Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: In prettiest pale grey, the daytona in shark grey is sweet and subtle. The durable, high quality faux wood that it's made from is water-resistant, so won't warp or crack in any room in the home. Choose from three shutter styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. Team the shark grey with a pure red tone for a strong and stylish colour scheme, perfect for a contemporary home. Keep the red to a minimum to avoid overpowering the room and include plenty of white and grey tones.

products.title: Daytona, Pure White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in pure white offers a classic white tone that will work in any surrounding. Made from high quality, durable faux wood, the shutter is designed to resist cracking and warping. Choose from three key styles: full height, caf, or tier on tier. Paint the wall surrounding the pure white in a bold, cheery colour that will allow the shutter to stand out and create a focal point in the room. Think apple green in the kitchen, sky blue in the home office, or lemon yellow in the guest bedroom.

products.title: Daytona, Maya Blue - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The serene sky blue of the daytona maya blue is pretty as a picture. The colour is the perfect shade for the smooth, durable faux wood that the shutter is made from. Choose from caf, full height, or tier on tier for the style that best suits your home. Soft whites and luxe creams will go beautifully with the lovely maya blue. Opt for a shabby chic or vintage look in a living room or bedroom to really make the most of this attractive shutter.

products.title: Daytona, Stratus Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Cool, calm, and bang on trend, the dove grey tone of the daytona in stratus grey is soothing and serene. All of the daytona range are made from high quality, durable faux wood, and are available in three unique styles: full height, caf, or tier on tier. Go for a fashion-forward choice of colour scheme by pairing the stratus grey with a dusky pink tone for a look that's both romantic and contemporary at the same time.

products.title: Daytona, Rose Blush - Plantation Shutter
products.description: In palest pink, the daytona range's rose blush is fresh and welcoming, and this barely-there pink is ideal for adding colour without overwhelming a room. As a bonus, the high quality faux wood of the shutter is moisture-resistant, so whether you hang it in the bedroom or the bathroom, you get long-lasting durability. Use the rose blush in the nursery for a serene and relaxing ambience that you'll want to spend all day in.

products.title: Daytona, Platinum Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The pale, serene platinum grey from the daytona range is pretty and subtle, making it the perfect alternative to white or cream. Choose from three styles: the classic full height, the boutique caf, or the versatile tier on tier. Use the platinum grey to complement any colour scheme. Try it with a bold plum purple for a striking and moody look in a dining room, furnishing with dark to medium woods and plenty of shimmering silvers to add a little glitz and glamour.

products.title: Daytona, River Mist Blue - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytone in river mist blue is aptly named with its dusky blue hue, pretty and understated. Choose this durable faux wood shutter in one of three distinct styles: the classic full height, the quirky boutique caf, or the versatile tier on tier. The river mist blue is the ideal addition to a nautical-themed room, where it will sit pretty amidst soft off-whites and shabby chic dcor. Include the occasional boat or anchor illustration, as well as rope, glass, and wood ornaments and frames.

products.title: Daytona, Cosmic Latte - Plantation Shutter
products.description: In a neutral oatmeal shade of grey, the daytona cosmic latte is soothing and natural. It's the perfect solution for those looking for a neutral colour that matches most colour schemes without opting for white. Choose from three unique styles. The cosmic latte will look lovely amidst many different dcor schemes, and will fit in particularly well with a neutral scheme, surrounded by chocolates, coffees, and creams.

products.title: Daytona, Pigeon Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The soft, barely-there grey hue of the daytona in pigeon grey is subtle and serene. The flawlessly painted faux wood is durable and water-resistant, so there's no need to worry about cracking or warping. Choose from full height, tier on tier, or caf. Blend the pigeon grey with soft blues for a calming ambience in room made for relaxing, such as the living room or a nursery. Include plenty of plush fabrics to make the room welcoming and comfortable, opting for chenilles and soft wools.

products.title: Daytona, Serpentine Green - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in serpentine green displays a dusky teal tone with a vintage aqua feel to it. Made from durable faux wood, the shutter is warp-resistant and crack-resistant, and won't respond to moist conditions - making it ideal for the bathroom or kitchen. Choose from three styles of shutter. Create an antique aqua colour scheme in the bathroom by surrounding the serpentine green with soft whites and matching teal accessories.

products.title: Daytona, Dolphin Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in dolphin grey shows a classic light grey tone that will work in any surrounding, traditional or contemporary. Made from durable, high quality faux wood, it is designed to resist cracking and warping. Choose from three unique, attractive styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. Colour the wall surrounding the dolphin in a cheery lemon yellow that will allow the grey hue to pop in a colour scheme that's bang on trend.

products.title: Daytona, Mademoiselle - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The dusky pink of the daytona in mademoiselle is pretty as a picture, and offers a gorgeously romantic hue to the shutter. Made from quality, water-resistant faux wood, the shutter is durable and sure to stand the test of time in whichever part of the home it's placed. Use the mademoiselle in the master bedroom for a sweet and romantic ambience that will be perfectly matched by soft off-white tones.

products.title: Daytona, Mint Green - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona mint green is aptly named, displaying a mild and pretty pale green tone that's both natural and attractive. This pastel hue covers a high quality, durable faux wood that won't crack or warp in moist conditions. Choose from tier on tier, caf, or full height styles. Pair the mint green with soft whites or barely-there creams for a chilled out, serene feeling in a bedroom, living room, or even kitchen.

products.title: Daytona, Falcon Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: A deep, characterful grey with coffee undertones, the daytona in falcon grey is striking yet understated. The water-resistant faux wood makes it ideal for use in the kitchen or the bathroom, where it won't be prone to any warping or cracking. Choose from three unique shutter styles. Settle the falcon grey into a neutrally toned room filled with greys, beiges, oatmeals, and creams. The end result will be one of understated luxe, and you'll find it relaxing and serene, perfect for a bedroom or living room.

products.title: Daytona, Gainsborough - Plantation Shutter
products.description: In light oatmeal grey, the daytona gainsborough is sleek and subtle. Whether you choose the classic full height style, which fits the whole height of your window; the quirky caf style, which covers just a portion; or the versatile tier on tier, which gives two shutters to be opened separately, you've certainly made the right choice of colour. This versatile shade will match a number of colour schemes.

products.title: Daytona, Chalk White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The chalk white, from the daytona range, is the ideal addition to a country or vintage-style home. Choose from tier on tier, full height, or caf style shutters, and enjoy the long-lasting durability that the moisture-resistant faux wood brings. Team the chalk white with light, natural woods and soft sage greens in a rustic country home. The look will be natural and peaceful, making it perfect for a kitchen, home office, or living room.

products.title: Daytona, Boutique Cream - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in boutique cream offers a classic cream shade on a durable faux wood that you'd be hard-pressed to tell apart from the real thing. Choose from the traditional full height style, the unique caf style, and the versatile tier on tier style. Surround the boutique cream with soft mauves and lavenders for a relaxing and serene ambience in your master bedroom or even living room. Or, opt for a pretty pastel pink bathroom look, adding rose pinks to the lovely cream of the shutter.
